body: @zycdragonball I would recommend following the recommendation of ebrevdo@ here. You can see other example of this pattern, https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/64f0ebd33a7c868da3c8f1ea15adf358c578f227/tensorflow/core/kernels/matrix_inverse_op.cc#L137
